headline.main: STRATEGY SET AT BERLIN; Caucasus Attack Put to Fore in Hitler's Plan of Offensive

lead_paragraph: BERNE, March 2 -- Germany is determined to go through with her Spring offensive, cost what it may, according to information from Berlin.
abstract: Jan Axis-Jap mil alliance effect on German Spring offensive plans discussed
